content:
Give Agents Access

You must assign a permission set to give agents access to Service Replies for Email in the Einstein Reply Recommendations component.

Available in: Lightning Experience, Enterprise and Unlimited Editions with the Einstein for Service add-on

To do this:

Assign Permission Sets
View Setup and Configuration
Customize Application

Select agents who will use Service Replies for Email.
Assign them the Email Response User permission set (included with the Service Cloud Einstein add-on license)
title: Granting Agents Access to Service Replies for Email
